onlyVisible.title: only include active and non-hidden categories

startTuningWorkflow.title:
Flag that inidicates if we should start the tuning workflow. Defaults to true
this will give us a chance to check the data(e.g. formatting issues, or other data related in accuracies) before starting the tuning workflow

externalId.title: external_id of the input category that you are getting the mappings for

origins.title: a list of categories in which the input category serves as the origin

targets.title: a list of categories in which the input category serves as the target

relationships.title: a list of mappings with all relationship details

type.title: The internal id of the category

categoryId.title: The internal id of the category

externalIds.title: external_id of the input category that you are getting the mapping for

updateExisting.title: Flag that indicates if the workflow should update existing embeddings, or only create new ones

isValid.title: Returns true when the category is a valid category
